title: Ticket #7170: Further reduce DAGMan memory footprint
description:
DAGMan still uses a lot of memory to hold a DAG even after the work in #7121.

In this ticket, we will reduce the memory used to store edges and vars.
remarks:
2019-Oct-24 11:12:27 by coatsworth:
CODE REVIEW

  • This is a lot of changes!
  • I've reviewed the code and generally feel good about how things look. My biggest concern is a few places where I don't understand why you're doing things in a certain way. I'm going to follow up requesting some comments shortly.
  • For now, I don't think any changes are needed to the code logic itself, so I'm going to mark this as documentation pending and hand it back.
